column1: The text introduces the policy, a section, or a group of practices, but it does not mention a specific practice.
The text describes how to contact the company with questions, concerns, or complaints about the privacy policy.
The policy makes generic security statements, e.g., "we protect your data" or "we use technology/encryption to protect your data".
The site collects your website activities for analytics or research. Collection happens when you implicitly provide information on the website, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
The text does not fit into our label scheme.
The site collects your computer information for analytics or research. Collection happens when you implicitly provide information on the website, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
The policy makes a statement about how data from children is treated.
The text describes a specific data practice that is not covered by our label scheme.
Data is accessible to employees/third parties on a need-to-know basis.
A named third party does receive unspecified information about you for legal requirements.
The site collects your IP address or device IDs for analytics or research. Collection happens when you implicitly provide information on the website, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
Data transfer between user and website/app is encrypted, e.g., SSL, TLS, HTTPS.
The company/organization has a privacy or security program/organization in place addressing, for example, how to protect data against unauthorized access or privacy training for employees.
You can opt out (by contacting the company) from the use of contact information by the site, which uses it for marketing purposes.
You can opt in for the use of unspecified information by a third party, which collects or receives it for an unspecified purpose.
The site collects your demographic information for personalization or customization. Collection happens in an unspecified way. You can configure your privacy with user settings provided by the site.

A named third party does track on the first party website or app your cookies or tracking elements for analytics or research. This applies to users with accounts. The data is aggregated or anonymized. You can configure your privacy with browser settings for the collection or sharing of your information.
A named third party does collect on the first party website or app unspecified information about you for analytics or research. The data is aggregated or anonymized.
A user's IP address and device IDs is retained for an unspecified duration to fulfill an unspecified purpose.
A specific security measure not covered above.

A named third party does track on the first party website or app your cookies or tracking elements for personalization or customization. The data is aggregated or anonymized. You can configure your privacy with browser settings.
The site collects your generic personal information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens when you explicitly provide information on the website.
The site does not collect your unspecified information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens on the website. You can opt in for data collection.
Privacy practices and security measures of the first party or third party are reviewed/audited by internal or external reviewers/auditors.
An unspecified third party does not receive information about you not covered by our label scheme for an unspecified purpose. You can opt in for data collection.
An unnamed third party does receive unspecified information about you for legal requirements.

The site collects your demographic information for analytics or research. Collection happens by a named service or third party. You can configure your privacy with user settings provided by the site for the use of your information.
You can use third party privacy settings to control the use of contact information by a third party, which uses it for marketing purposes.

The site collects your cookies or tracking elements for analytics or research. Collection happens in an unspecified way, and your data is aggregated or anonymized. You can configure your privacy with browser settings.

The site collects your unspecified information for analytics or research. Collection happens when you implicitly provide information on the website for a user type outside of our label scheme. You can choose not to use the service or feature for the collection of your information.
An unnamed third party does receive unspecified information about you for a basic service or feature.

The site collects your generic personal information for marketing purposes. Collection happens when you explicitly provide information by some means outside of our label scheme. You can opt in for data collection for the use of your information.

The site collects your unspecified information for marketing purposes. Collection happens when you explicitly provide information on the website. You can choose not to use the service or feature for the collection of your information.
An unnamed third party does see unspecified information about you for a basic service or feature.
A named third party does receive your contact information for an unspecified purpose. This applies to users with accounts. You can opt out by contacting the company for the use of your information.

An unnamed third party does do something outside of our label scheme with your contact information for an unspecified purpose. You can opt out by contacting the company for the use of your information.
A named third party does receive your contact information for a basic service or feature. You can configure your privacy using a method outside our label scheme.
A third party outside of our label scheme does receive unspecified information about you for service operations or security.
You can opt in for the use of unspecified information by a third party, which collects or receives it for marketing purposes.

The site collects an information type outside of our label scheme for analytics or research. Collection happens when you implicitly provide information on the website, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
You can opt out (by contacting the company) from the use of unspecified information by the site, which uses it for marketing purposes.
The site does not collect your generic personal information for an unspecified purpose. Collection happens in an unspecified way for users without accounts. You can opt in for data collection.
User authentication, e.g., login to a user account, is encrypted/secured.

The site collects your unspecified information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens when you explicitly provide information on the website. You can choose not to use the service or feature for the collection of your information.

A named third party does receive your demographic information for targeted advertising. You can configure your privacy with user settings provided by the site for the collection or sharing and use of your information.

The site collects your cookies or tracking elements for personalization or customization. Collection happens in an unspecified way, and your data is aggregated or anonymized. You can configure your privacy with browser settings.
A user's computer information is retained for an unspecified duration to fulfill an unspecified purpose.
A named third party does receive unspecified information about you for service operations or security.
You can opt in for the use of contact information by a third party, which uses it for marketing purposes.
A user's information of a type not covered by our label scheme is retained for an unspecified duration to fulfill an unspecified purpose.
A named third party does receive your financial information for a basic service or feature. You can configure your privacy using a method outside our label scheme.
You can use privacy configuration settings (in your browser or on your device) to control the use of unspecified information by a third party, which uses it for a basic service or feature.

The site collects your generic personal information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens when you explicitly provide information in an unspecified way. You can opt in for data collection for the collection of your information.

The site collects your demographic information for advertising. Collection happens by a named service or third party. You can configure your privacy with user settings provided by the site for the use of your information.
A user's activities on the website or app is retained for an unspecified duration to fulfill an unspecified purpose.

The site collects your generic personal information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens when you explicitly provide information by some means outside of our label scheme. You can opt in for data collection for the use of your information.
A third party outside of our label scheme does receive unspecified information about you for legal requirements.

The site collects your unspecified information for personalization or customization. Collection happens when you implicitly provide information on the website for a user type outside of our label scheme. You can choose not to use the service or feature for the collection of your information.
The site collects your cookies or tracking elements for personalization or customization. Collection happens on the website for users with accounts.
An unnamed third party does not receive your contact information for an unspecified purpose. You can opt in for data collection.
The site collects your cookies or tracking elements for analytics or research. Collection happens on the website.
You can opt in for the use of unspecified information by a third party, which uses it for marketing purposes.
The site collects your generic personal information for marketing purposes. Collection happens when you explicitly provide information on the website.
A user's unspecified information is retained for a duration not covered by our label scheme to perform a requested service, and then it is deleted..
